description: Episode of Series "Ageing in the New Age". Some cultures such as the Australian Aboriginal, Western Samoan and Chinese still maintain traditions of respect and status for their older members. This film looks at some families in Australia (a country where the nuclear family is the norm) who are maintaining extended family life styles. Suitable for middle and upper secondary level.
